Description: QB bubbles sized by weekly passing yards
Y-axis = TDs / X-axis = INTs - top-left is elite
X = air yards / Y = yards after catch
Story It Tells: Deep throwers vs dink-and-dunk + good receivers

Description: How often pressured vs how often sacked
Quick release left / slow release right
RB bubbles sized by weekly rushing yards
Inner circle = before contact / outer = after
Story It Tells: OL run blocking vs RB talent
Who gets open vs who doesn't

Description: Crown or star icon in red zone
Size = magnitude / green positive red negative
Line chart of WPA through game
Player bubbles sized by weekly fantasy points
X = draft pick / Y = career value
Faded bubble = last week / solid = this week
Half this year / half last year
